mapper.select: select * from board order by gid desc, seq limit #{start} , #{limit}
select * from board where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, pname, pw, upfile, content, reg_date, cnt, seq, lev , gid) values (#{title}, #{pname}, #{pw}, #{upfile}, #{content}, sysdate(), 0, 0, 0, #{gid})
mapper.delete: delete from board where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
update board set upfile = null where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update board set cnt = cnt + 1 where id = #{id}
